sub_title: Business Teacher / Higher Education Consultant / Organisation & Management Consultant  /  Personal and Professional Development Coach / Project Management Expert
summary:
Championing the concepts of international best practice at very high standards within Higher Education, Training and Professional Development and Management Consultancy, I have worked as a teacher and lecturer in British, Nigerian and most recently Dutch universities and higher educational institutions. I have also led the coordination, facilitation and delivery of several tailor made professional development workshops in Europe and Africa. I am an outstanding educationist and an inspirational teacher with a huge passion for teaching; training, learning & continuous professional development; consultancy; education management; project management; strategy management; international development and volunteering to charity organisations around the world.  

Due to my passion for dianosing and proffering SMART solutions to the root causes of management, organisational and personal professional development problems, i founded iDPS Consults Netherlands (www.idpsconsults.com),  a professional consultancy service company in the Netherlands. At iDPS Consults Netherlands, we provide  study in Europe services for international students from around the world, we provide mentorship services for international students and professionals around the world and we offer management consultancy in the form of tailor made corporate trainings and workshops for orgamisations and their employees.

For my educational background, I do have a Masters degree in Consultancy and Entrepreneurship from the Rotterdam Business School, Netherlands. Prior to this, I studied in the United Kingdom where I gained an Advanced Diploma in Business and Administrative Management from the Institute of Administrative Management (IAM), a BSc Honours in Management and Business Administration from the Manchester Metropolitan University and went on to train as a teacher/lecturer and gained the City & Guilds Diploma to Teach in the Lifelong Learning Sector (DTLLS).  Furthermore, I successfully completed the PRINCE2 Project Management course hence, I am an APMG Certified Project Manager.  

 I am Basis Kwalificatie Examinering (BKE) certified and this is from the Nederlandse Vereniging voor Examens (NVE).  I am a member of distinguished professional bodies like the Chartered Management Institute United Kingdom (CMI), the Institute of Administrative Management United Kingdom (IAM), the APMG International and the Holland Alumni network.  

Due to my interest in African Unity and Development, I founded Africa Must Develop (AMD)

contributors.headline: Business Teacher / Higher Education Consultant / Organisation & Management Consultant  /  Personal and Professional Development Coach / Project Management Expert

profile_positions.description: Fontys University of Applied Science is a high quality educational institution in the southeast of the Netherlands. At the International Business School of this university, my expertise as a Business Management Teacher, Continuous Personal and Professional Development (CPPD) Coach and a Management Consultant is used to deliver practical and student centred education through the planning and delivery of courses such as Personal and Professional Development, Marketing Analysis, Business Economics and Organisation and People to our students who come from all over the world. Furthermore, as an expert in Entrepreneurship and Consultancy, I coach, supervise and assess the students in various groups or as individuals on projects which challenge the students to act as an entrepreneur or business, organisation and management consultants. These include workplacements, internships and graduation assignments for final year students. I also teach/train the students to use various business models and industry international best practises to diagnose real life business, organisation or management problems from its root causes and proffer SMART solutions or apply relevant business strategies. Inline with the mission of the university, I offer inspiring, challenging and high quality professional education to the students. Lastly, I mentor and motivate the students to understand that the global business environment can be explored and exploited in such a way that it has no negative effects on people and our planet.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, International Business School (IBS),

profile_positions.description: iDiagnose and Proffer Solutions (iDPS Consults Netherlands) is a professional consultancy service company in the Netherlands. We diagnose business, management and organisational problems from its root causes and then proffer tailor made solutions. Registered in Netherlands, we carry out consultancy services across the European Schengen Area and the rest of the world. We specialise in European Educational Services Consultancy; Business and Entrepreneurship Consultancy; Management Consultancy; Organisational Consultancy; Project Management Consultancy; Continuous Personal and Professional Development Consultancy and ICT Consultancy.  Through corporate trainings, we help our clients’ match their business needs / ideas with the right SMART solutions. At iDPS Consults Netherlands, we provide  study in Europe services for international students from around the world, we provide mentorship services for international students and professionals around the world and we offer management consultancy in the form of tailor made corporate trainings and workshops for orgamisations and their employees. Furthermore, iDPS Consults Netherlands is an Host Entrepreneur with the Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs (E.Y.E) programme which is a cross-border concept in the European Union. As an Host Entrepreneur, we facilitate the exchange of entrepreneurial and management experience with the main aim on training, coaching and motivating new entrepreneurs in order to boost Europe's entrepreneurial culture. At iDPS Consults Netherlands, we give you solutions of the ‘What? Who? When? Why? Where? And the How?’ For us at iDPS Consults Netherlands, our customers must be delighted. Please visit our website www.idpsconsults.com to know more about what we do and how we can help you.
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer / Lead Consultant

profile_positions.description: As a freelancer with this organisation, I design short quality continuous professional development programmes in the form of tailor made workshops and then coordinate and facilitate the delivery of this highly interactive, client centered workshops according to best practices and international standards. The solution oriented workshops at IPro Training are made available to strategic, tactical and operational personnel from both Dutch and International Organisations.
profile_positions.title: Learning And Professional Development Consultant

profile_positions.description: Working at the International Business School (IBS) of the Saxion University of Applied Sciences in both Deventer and Enschede campuses, I champion concious business education by using my influencial, motivational and inspirational teaching styles to educate the students in the fields of Management and Organisation; Management of Control; Purchasing; Supply Chain Process; Cultural Management; Personal Development; Total Quality Management and general Professional Development activities. I translate authentic industry/business problems into representative and suitable education assignments and assessments in terms of both content and didactics. I also coach and mentor students who are on their internships in organisations from all over the world in their learning processes with real life industry experiences or business cases/projects and help them develop into management experts in international business. Furthermore, I supervise final year students through the different stages of their thesis (i.e.: graduation assignment), the task here is to facilitate a process which brings out the best in the students in terms of critical thinking, research/analytical skills and problem solving. Lastly, I develop examinations, measure and assess students’ development through the results and provide constructive feedback to the students.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, International Business School (IBS)

profile_positions.description: As a management consultant at this international fruits servicing organisation, I helped the organisation by diagnosing the main organisational problems and proffering the appropriate business solutions. My business skills provided objective advice to help MFS develop some specialist skills that it was lacking. Furthermore I manage the marketing activities in terms of branding and business development at Macari Fruits Services.
profile_positions.title: Management Consultant

company.name: Institute of Technology and Management, Ugep

profile_positions.description:
I am the Coordinator of the Institute of Technology and Management, Ugep’s Learning and Development Centre (ITM - LDC) which is the Training and Development department of the Institute.

I lead, coordinate and oversee the facilitation and delivery of highly professional tailor made trainings, workshops and continuous professional development to Private and Public Organisations, Government Agencies, NGOs, Religious Institutions, Political Parties, Civil Society Organisations (CSOs), Social Clubs, Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs), etc.

At the ITM - LDC, we recently went into strategic partnership with Canadian NGO Cuso International to coordinate, facilitate and deliver a 2 Weeks Entrepreneurship Development Training Programme (EDTP) Workshop to hundreds of participants from over Eighteen (18) organisations from different parts of Cross River State. The Entrepreneurship Development Training Programme (EDTP) workshop was focused on the natural resources sector, i.e.: Agriculture, Aquaculture, Forestry (Non Timber), Poultry and Eco-Tourism.

Our vision at the ITM - LDC is to become a solution centre to Cross River State and Nigeria’s socio-economic issues.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator, Learning and Development Centre (ITM - LDC)

profile_positions.description: ITM has been established by the Cross River State Government (CRSG) of Nigeria in partnership with Highbury College Portsmouth, United Kingdom as part of a unique, transformational state wide Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) Ecosystem project. As a pioneer staff, I act as the Programme Leader of Business Management and Entrepreneurship department. I am part of the strategic team whose vision is to develop a world-class entrepreneurial polytechnic institute, the first of its kind in Nigeria. My role is to lead student centred teaching on a range of courses relating to Business Management and Entrepreneurship and provide high quality teaching and learning opportunities that meet the needs of individual students and groups in line with the Institute’s strategic priorities and objectives. So far, I have mentored colleagues and we developed quality course materials for the the Business Management and Entrepreneurship department. Teachers under my mentorship have achieved good grades during their formal lesson observation. I have taught modules like Marketing, Business Environment, Management and Leadership, Human Resources and Project Management. I also provide flexible assessment opportunities and closely plan, monitor, track and record student retention, achievement and success. I contribute to the development and delivery of high quality, relevant curriculum for the Business Management and Entrepreneurship programmes. Furthermore, I am one of the designated Student Industrial Work Experience (SIWES) coordinators which means I liaise between our Institute and the Industrial Trust Fund (ITF). I hold regular motivational sessions with the students and I provide academic and pastoral support to all students. At the request of other departments, I have facilitated and delivered tailor made Continuous Professional Development (CPD) workshops to the different functional areas of the Institute.
profile_positions.title: Head of Department, Business Management and Entrepreneurship

profile_positions.description: Messe Rand is an international training provider in the United Kingdom dedicated to supporting professionals (individuals and groups from organisations) across the globe in realising their full potentials. I facilitate and also deliver international workshops for this reputable organisations. I send regular highlight reports to the Executive Board in order to ensure maintenance of quality standards. Some of the delegates i trained were from the Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission (ICPC) Nigeria, West Africa where I delivered a 3 days' workshop titled 'Using ICT to Curb Public Sector Corruption' and the Nigerian Petroleum Development Company (NPDC) where i delivered a workshop on ‘Managing the Tendering Process’. Furthermore, I regularly delivered workshops to various country's UN committees on the then Millennium Development Goals (now Sustainable Development Goals) with the last delivery to the Oyo State, Nigeria UN committee on the MDGs.
profile_positions.title: Learning And Professional Development Specialist

profile_positions.description: Using the teaching concepts of inclusivity and differentiation, I teach and deliver lectures for the Edexcel Business modules at HND Level 5. Areas of specialisation are Business Environment, Organisations and Behaviour, Marketing Principles and Aspects of Contracts and Negligence for business. My other responsibilities as a lecturer at this UKBA highly trusted college include facilitation of seminars / workshops, offering group and one-to-one support to learners, assessing learners, giving feedback to the learners and executive management team of the college and facilitating learners to reach their full potential and thereby achieving their academic goals. Finally, I ensure equality and also celebrate diversity amongst all students.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, Business Management

profile_positions.description: Championing the use of different learning styles, I teach and lecture business and administrative management modules such as the Institute of Administrative Management's Strategic Management at Level 6, Edexcel's Quality Management and Organisations and Behaviour at Level 5. My role at this Highly Trusted Status College include Subject Tutoring, Personal Tutoring and Assessing (Marking), giving feedbacks to learners, preparation of schemes of work and individual lesson plans.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, Management and Business Administration

profile_positions.description: I was a lecturer of administrative and business management at level 4. I teach adult students business modules covering Quality Management, Operations Management, ICT and Knowledge Management and Finance. The main awarding body for these courses is the prestigious Institute of Administrative Management www.instam.org .My responsibilities as a lecturer at this highly rated college include tutoring, mentoring, coaching, motivating, assessing, giving feedback and facilitating students towards achieving their academic goals.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer, Administrative Management

company.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

volunteer_experiences.description: As an APMG certified PRINCE2 PRACTITIONER, I currently volunteer as a guest lecturer teaching Project Management with emphasis on Project Time Management to the International Financial Management and Controls (IFMC) students at The Hague University of Applied Sciences. My role include helping the undergraduate students to understand the importance of managing their time effectively when working on projects in groups. I also assess and give constructive feedback to the students during their project presentations. The objective is for the students to master the concept of Project Time Management.

volunteer_experiences.role: Volunteering Director of Continuous Personal Professional Development (CPPD) Programmes
volunteer_experiences.description: At this Non-Governmental Organisation (NGO) based in Rotterdam, we support African immigrants (legal and illegal) in the Kingdom of The Netherlands and other member countries of the European Union. In my capacity as a Volunteering Director of Continuous Personal Professional Development (CPPD) Programmes, I design, plan and facilitate tailor made workshops for this start-up NGO. The workshop sessions are used as a platform to educate, empower and motivate Africans in the Netherlands in the areas of Personal Effectiveness, Professional Development, Entrepreneurship and Leadership. I also act in the capacity of a Consultant and I help the Founder of this small non-profit making organisation with analysing situations, formulating strategies and implementing specific strategies.

At REES Africa, our ultimate goal is to preserve our environment for future generations by living sustainably whilst boosting economic development. My mandate as a Director is to establish policies for corporate management and oversight, making decisions on major company issues. I lead the process of promoting environmental sustainability as a lifestyle.

As a Volunteer, I worked at the BHF shop in Romford, Essex where i help with local fundraising or raise funds for the organisation's Mending Broken Hearts Appeal, or even campaign for the UK's heart health. I work as part of a great team where we are serving customers, helping with stock collections, sorting donations or window dressing. Besides helping to raise vital funds, I help raise awareness of heart health and the British Heart Foundation's life-saving work.

Africa Must Develop (AMD) is a PAN Africanism group founded by Mr Olumayowa Victor Ogunsola who is a Pan Africanist, Lecturer of Business Management and Entrepreneurship, Management and Professional Development Consultant, Motivational Speaker and Political/Human Right Activist. 

Africa Must Develop (AMD) is open to all Africans and non Africans around the world who have a passion to see Africa develop. This non governmental group will serve as a medium to advocate for the development of Africa as a continent. We will strive to inform Africans that it is only Africans that can develop Africa. We will speak against corruption, injustice, bad leadership, mismanagement, carefree attitude of Africans towards corrupt governance and the failed system that is destroying Africa. We will advocate for African Unity. We may sound harsh in some of our post but we will be very constructive in our criticism. 

We welcome you all to join us in making sure that Africa Must Develop. You can please contact us as below :

Our Blog: www.amdnow.blogspot.com
Contact us on Twitter: @AMDnow
Like our FaceBook Page: Africa Must Develop - AMD.
Direct Line: +31 649 154 231

Our ultimate goal is that ''Africa Must Develop''. God bless Africa, God bless you all.
